headline: Tour Confidential: Will Rory McIlroy's Lawsuit Impact His Season?
short_headline: Will Rory McIlroy's Lawsuit Impact Season?
body: Host Jessica Marksbury asks Mark Godich and David DeNunzio of Golf Magazine and Sports Illustrated's Cameron Morfit how Rory McIlroy's lawsuit with Horizon Sports will affect his upcoming season, starting with him sitting out the World Golf Championships-HSBC Champions event.
